author: Staff Reporter
text:
Inter-Departmental Cricket Tournament was organised at Kamaraj College grounds here on Monday ahead of the Founder’s Day, which falls on March 22. The tournament was declared open by D. Nagarajan, Principal. The initial match was kicked off between students from Department of History and Microbiology. Sixteen departments of various disciplines would compete in this cricket tournament titled ‘Founder’s Memorial Tournament’.

Several programmes were scheduled to be organised at the college in memory of the founder, A.M.M.S. Ganesan Nadar, Principal said. Earlier, a quiz competition was organised by Department of Economics as part of the ongoing golden jubilee year programme. Several colleges affiliated to Manonmaniam Sundaranar University participated in the quiz.

Students of Popes College, Sawyerpuram, won the first prize in the quiz competition, he said.
title: Cricket tournament
